name: CIPHERCELL (Demo)
description:
CIPHERCELL is a minimalist logic puzzle game where you slide cells together to perform basic arithmetic. The objective is to get the last cell to zero.


Larger numbers subtract smaller numbers when slid in that order. Conversely, smaller numbers get added to larger numbers. Equal numbers cancel each other out.

Features:

  • Easy to learn, hard to Master: Order of events and number comparisons determine the outcome
  • Hundreds of Levels
  • Multiple solutions to problems
  • Easy to use and slick controls
  • Relaxing and soothing experience
  • Ambient Sound Track

If you enjoyed the demo, make sure to Wishlist the game on Steam and follow me here on Itch to get notified of release!

Note: This is a demo, and not a final version of the game.
